verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> upon הַנְּחִיל֗וֹת <S%H5155><s%> upon Nehiloth מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David אֲמָרַ֖י <S%H561><s%> to my words הַאֲזִ֥ינָה ׀ <S%H238><s%> Give ear יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD בִּ֣ינָה <S%H995><s%> consider הֲגִֽיגִי׃ <S%H1901><s%> my meditation

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה ׀ <S%H7181><s%> Hearken לְק֬וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice שַׁוְעִ֗י <S%H7773><s%> of my cry מַלְכִּ֥י <S%H4428><s%> my King וֵאלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> and my God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> to אֶתְפַּלָּֽל׃ <S%H6419><s%> for unto thee will I pray

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD בֹּ֭קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning תִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> shalt thou hear קוֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> My voice בֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning אֶֽעֱרָךְ־ <S%H6186><s%> will I direct לְ֝ךָ֗ וַאֲצַפֶּֽה׃ <S%H6822><s%> [my prayer] unto thee and will look up

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> No אֵֽל־ <S%H410><s%> For thou [art] not a God חָפֵ֘ץ <S%H2655><s%> that hath pleasure רֶ֥שַׁע ׀ <S%H7562><s%> in wickedness אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> No יְגֻרְךָ֣ <S%H1481><s%> dwell רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> neither shall evil

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <S%H3320><s%> shall not stand הֽ֭וֹלְלִים <S%H1984><s%> The foolish לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H2962><s%> before עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight שָׂ֝נֵ֗אתָ <S%H8130><s%> thou hatest כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> all workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> of iniquity

תְּאַבֵּד֮ <S%H6><s%> Thou shalt destroy דֹּבְרֵ֪י <S%H1696><s%> them that speak כָ֫זָ֥ב <S%H3577><s%> leasing אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man דָּמִ֥ים <S%H1818><s%> the bloody וּמִרְמָ֗ה <S%H4820><s%> and deceitful יְתָ֘עֵ֥ב ׀ <S%H8581><s%> will abhor יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> by בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> in the multitude חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> of thy mercy אָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> But as for me I will come בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> [into] thy house אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <S%H7812><s%> will I worship אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֵֽיכַל־ <S%H1964><s%> temple קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <S%H6944><s%> toward thy holy בְּיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3374><s%> [and] in thy fear

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD נְחֵ֬נִי <S%H5148><s%> Lead בְצִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H6666><s%> in thy righteousness לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because שׁוֹרְרָ֑י <S%H8324><s%> because of mine enemies [הֹושַׁר כ] (הַיְשַׁ֖ר <S%H3474><s%> direct ק) לְפָנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before my face דַּרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H1870><s%> make thy way

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֪ין <S%H369><s%> There בְּפִ֡יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> in their mouth נְכוֹנָה֮ <S%H3559><s%> For [there is] no faithfulness קִרְבָּ֪ם <S%H7130><s%> their inward הַ֫וּ֥וֹת <S%H1942><s%> part [is] very wickedness קֶֽבֶר־ <S%H6913><s%> sepulchre פָּת֥וּחַ <S%H6605><s%> [is] an open גְּרוֹנָ֑ם <S%H1627><s%> their throat לְ֝שׁוֹנָ֗ם <S%H3956><s%> with their tongue יַחֲלִֽיקוּן׃ <S%H2505><s%> they flatter

הַֽאֲשִׁימֵ֨ם ׀ <S%H816><s%> Destroy אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> thou them O God יִפְּלוּ֮ <S%H5307><s%> let them fall מִֽמֹּעֲצ֪וֹתֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H4156><s%> by their own counsels בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> in the multitude פִּ֭שְׁעֵיהֶם <S%H6588><s%> of their transgressions הַדִּיחֵ֑מוֹ <S%H5080><s%> cast them out כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָ֥רוּ <S%H4784><s%> for they have rebelled בָֽךְ׃

וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ <S%H8055><s%> in thee rejoice כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all ח֪וֹסֵי <S%H2620><s%> But let all those that put their trust בָ֡ךְ לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> let them ever יְ֭רַנֵּנוּ <S%H7442><s%> shout for joy וְתָסֵ֣ךְ <S%H5526><s%> because thou defendest עָלֵ֑ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> and וְֽיַעְלְצ֥וּ <S%H5970><s%> be joyful בְ֝ךָ֗ אֹהֲבֵ֥י <S%H157><s%> them let them also that love שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> thy name

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּה֮ <S%H859><s%> who תְּבָרֵ֪ךְ <S%H1288><s%> wilt bless צַ֫דִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> For thou LORD כַּ֝צִּנָּ֗ה <S%H6793><s%> him as [with] a shield רָצ֥וֹן <S%H7522><s%> with favour תַּעְטְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5849><s%> wilt thou compass
